data.eml:eml: Revision of the World species of the genus Chromoteleia Ashmead (Hymenoptera, Platygastridae, Scelioninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Hua-yan, Talamas, Elijah J., Valerio, Alejandro A., Masner, Lubomir, Johnson, Norman F. (2018): Revision of the World species of the genus Chromoteleia Ashmead (Hymenoptera, Platygastridae, Scelioninae). ZooKeys 778: 1-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.778.25775, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.778.25775
